title: Direct marketing
description: The events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

bounces.description: Asynchronous messages that have been returned as temporarily undeliverable the receiving system.

mirrorPages.description: Click on a link in a message to a web hosted mirror page.

nonDeliverables.description: Asynchronous messages failed to deliver in a way that indicates that no future delivery attempts will be successful to the address.

sends.description: Asynchronous messages such as email, SMS, and MMS that have been dispatched to a person's account, address, or device.

userComplaints.description: User complaint or complaints have been received. This generally occurs when a recipient of a message reports it as spam.

opens.description: The direct marketing message such as email, SMS, and push notifications has been opened, swiped, or touched by the recipient.

unsubscriptions.description: The recipient of the direct marketing message such as email or newsletters has opted out from receiving them.

notSent.description: Asynchronous message such as email, SMS, or MMS was not dispatched due to cancellation or expiration of the marketing activity.

offerOpens.description: Offer in a marketing message such as email, SMS, or push notifications has been opened, swiped, touched or otherwise interacted with by the recipient.

impressions.description: The direct marketing message such as push notifications or in-app message has been seen by the end user.
